eftaios.view

Class View

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.Observable
      • eftaios.view.View
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    EventVisitor, java.lang.Runnable, java.util.Observer
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    CommandLineInterface, GraphicUserInterface, SocketServerInput

    public abstract class View
extends java.util.Observable
implements java.util.Observer, EventVisitor, java.lang.Runnable
    Observable (by the controller) and Observer(of the Model) class containing a copy the model of the user all of his infos

      • update

        public void update(java.util.Observable obs,
          java.lang.Object arg)
        Function that everytime the model is updated, the view captures the model and stores it also stores the game and the currentPlayer. After that, it executes the command by being the EventVisitor of the GameEvent sent as Object
        Specified by:
        update in interface java.util.Observer
        Parameters:
        Observable - obs (Model), Object arg (GameEvent)
